short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mobile time keeping with simple barcode scanning on your phone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track your employees time using a simple barcode ID card and the power of your phone. Great for construction companies scanning in crew members as they arrive on site.

iPhone and Android apps available as well as a wall-mounted TimeTabletÂ® device.

All data syncs to the cloud within minutes.

View timesheets online and export to MYOB, Quickbooks, Paychex, SurePayroll, FlexiTime, Ace Payroll, Smooth Pay, Smart Payroll, Crystal Payroll, GreenTree and more.

If the cellphone is out of reception it will still clock in/out and send the data when the phone comes back online.

GPS position at point of in/out as an account option.

Also supports NFC for Android phones that support it!
